00001 /**
00002  * \file MagneticField.cpp
00003  * \brief Command line utility for evaluating magnetic fields
00004  *
00005  * Copyright (c) Charles Karney (2011) <charles@karney.com> and licensed under
00006  * the MIT/X11 License.  For more information, see
00007  * http://geographiclib.sourceforge.net/
00008  *
00009  * Compile with -I../include and link with MagneticModel.o DMS.o
00010  * SphericalEngine.o
00011  *
00012  * See the <a href="MagneticField.1.html">man page</a> for usage
00013  * information.
00014  **********************************************************************/
00015 
00016 #include <iostream>
00017 #include <string>
00018 #include <sstream>
00019 #include <fstream>
00020 #include <ctime>
00021 #include <GeographicLib/MagneticModel.hpp>
00022 #include <GeographicLib/DMS.hpp>
00023 #include <GeographicLib/Utility.hpp>
00024 
00025 #include "MagneticField.usage"
00026 
00027 int main(int argc, char* argv[]) {
00028   try {
00029     using namespace GeographicLib;
00030     typedef Math::real real;
00031     bool verbose = false;
00032     std::string dir;
00033     std::string model = MagneticModel::DefaultMagneticName();
00034     std::string istring, ifile, ofile;
00035     real time = 0;
00036     bool timeset = false, rate = false;
00037     real hguard = 500000, tguard = 50;
00038     int prec = 1;
00039 
00040     for (int m = 1; m < argc; ++m) {
00041       std::string arg(argv[m]);
00042       if (arg == "-n") {
00043         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00044         model = argv[m];
00045       } else if (arg == "-d") {
00046         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00047         dir = argv[m];
00048       } else if (arg == "-t") {
00049         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00050         try {
00051           time = Utility::fractionalyear<real>(std::string(argv[m]));
00052           timeset = true;
00053         }
00054         catch (const std::exception& e) {
00055           std::cerr << "Error decoding argument of " << arg << ": "
00056                     << e.what() << "\n";
00057           return 1;
00058         }
00059       } else if (arg == "-r")
00060         rate = !rate;
00061       else if (arg == "-p") {
00062         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00063         try {
00064           prec = Utility::num<int>(std::string(argv[m]));
00065         }
00066         catch (const std::exception&) {
00067           std::cerr << "Precision " << argv[m] << " is not a number\n";
00068           return 1;
00069         }
00070       } else if (arg == "-T") {
00071         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00072         try {
00073           tguard = Utility::num<real>(std::string(argv[m]));
00074         }
00075         catch (const std::exception& e) {
00076           std::cerr << "Error decoding argument of " << arg << ": "
00077                     << e.what() << "\n";
00078           return 1;
00079         }
00080       } else if (arg == "-H") {
00081         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00082         try {
00083           hguard = Utility::num<real>(std::string(argv[m]));
00084         }
00085         catch (const std::exception& e) {
00086           std::cerr << "Error decoding argument of " << arg << ": "
00087                     << e.what() << "\n";
00088           return 1;
00089         }
00090       } else if (arg == "-v")
00091         verbose = true;
00092       else if (arg == "--input-string") {
00093         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00094         istring = argv[m];
00095       } else if (arg == "--input-file") {
00096         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00097         ifile = argv[m];
00098       } else if (arg == "--output-file") {
00099         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00100         ofile = argv[m];
00101       } else if (arg == "--version") {
00102         std::cout
00103           << argv[0]
00104           << ": $Id: a104971f07ce982fb114f550ddfa21b507116021 $\n"
00105           << "GeographicLib version " << GEOGRAPHICLIB_VERSION_STRING << "\n";
00106         return 0;
00107       } else {
00108         int retval = usage(!(arg == "-h" || arg == "--help"), arg != "--help");
00109         if (arg == "-h")
00110           std::cout<< "\nDefault magnetic path = \""
00111                    << MagneticModel::DefaultMagneticPath()
00112                    << "\"\nDefault magnetic name = \""
00113                    << MagneticModel::DefaultMagneticName()
00114                    << "\"\n";
00115         return retval;
00116       }
00117     }
00118 
00119     if (!ifile.empty() && !istring.empty()) {
00120       std::cerr << "Cannot specify --input-string and --input-file together\n";
00121       return 1;
00122     }
00123     if (ifile == "-") ifile.clear();
00124     std::ifstream infile;
00125     std::istringstream instring;
00126     if (!ifile.empty()) {
00127       infile.open(ifile.c_str());
00128       if (!infile.is_open()) {
00129         std::cerr << "Cannot open " << ifile << " for reading\n";
00130         return 1;
00131       }
00132     } else if (!istring.empty()) {
00133       std::string::size_type m = 0;
00134       while (true) {
00135         m = istring.find(';', m);
00136         if (m == std::string::npos)
00137           break;
00138         istring[m] = '\n';
00139       }
00140       instring.str(istring);
00141     }
00142     std::istream* input = !ifile.empty() ? &infile :
00143       (!istring.empty() ? &instring : &std::cin);
00144 
00145     std::ofstream outfile;
00146     if (ofile == "-") ofile.clear();
00147     if (!ofile.empty()) {
00148       outfile.open(ofile.c_str());
00149       if (!outfile.is_open()) {
00150         std::cerr << "Cannot open " << ofile << " for writing\n";
00151         return 1;
00152       }
00153     }
00154     std::ostream* output = !ofile.empty() ? &outfile : &std::cout;
00155 
00156     tguard = std::max(real(0), tguard);
00157     hguard = std::max(real(0), hguard);
00158     prec = std::min(10, std::max(0, prec));
00159     int retval = 0;
00160     try {
00161       const MagneticModel m(model, dir);
00162       if (timeset && (time < m.MinTime() - tguard ||
00163                       time > m.MaxTime() + tguard))
00164         throw GeographicErr("Time " + Utility::str(time) +
00165                             " too far outside allowed range [" +
00166                             Utility::str(m.MinTime()) + "," +
00167                             Utility::str(m.MaxTime()) + "]");
00168       if (verbose) {
00169         std::cerr << "Magnetic file: " << m.MagneticFile()      << "\n"
00170                   << "Name: "          << m.MagneticModelName() << "\n"
00171                   << "Description: "   << m.Description()       << "\n"
00172                   << "Date & Time: "   << m.DateTime()          << "\n"
00173                   << "Time range: ["
00174                   << m.MinTime() << ","
00175                   << m.MaxTime() << "]\n"
00176                   << "Height range: ["
00177                   << m.MinHeight()/1000 << "km,"
00178                   << m.MaxHeight()/1000 << "km]\n";
00179       }
00180       if (timeset && (time < m.MinTime() || time > m.MaxTime()))
00181         std::cerr << "WARNING: Time " << time
00182                   << " outside allowed range ["
00183                   << m.MinTime() << "," << m.MaxTime() << "]\n";
00184 
00185       std::string s, stra, strb;
00186       while (std::getline(*input, s)) {
00187         try {
00188           std::istringstream str(s);
00189           if (!timeset) {
00190             if (!(str >> stra))
00191               throw GeographicErr("Incomplete input: " + s);
00192             time = Utility::fractionalyear<real>(stra);
00193             if (time < m.MinTime() - tguard || time > m.MaxTime() + tguard)
00194               throw GeographicErr("Time " + Utility::str(time) +
00195                                   " too far outside allowed range [" +
00196                                   Utility::str(m.MinTime()) + "," +
00197                                   Utility::str(m.MaxTime()) +
00198                                   "]");
00199             if (time < m.MinTime() || time > m.MaxTime())
00200               std::cerr << "WARNING: Time " << time
00201                         << " outside allowed range ["
00202                         << m.MinTime() << "," << m.MaxTime() << "]\n";
00203           }
00204           real h;
00205           if (!(str >> stra >> strb >> h))
00206             throw GeographicErr("Incomplete input: " + s);
00207           real lat, lon;
00208           DMS::DecodeLatLon(stra, strb, lat, lon);
00209           if (h < m.MinHeight() - hguard || h > m.MaxHeight() + hguard)
00210             throw GeographicErr("Height " + Utility::str(h/1000) +
00211                                 "km too far outside allowed range [" +
00212                                 Utility::str(m.MinHeight()/1000) + "km," +
00213                                 Utility::str(m.MaxHeight()/1000) + "km]");
00214           if (h < m.MinHeight() || h > m.MaxHeight())
00215             std::cerr << "WARNING: Height " << h/1000
00216                       << "km outside allowed range ["
00217                       << m.MinHeight()/1000 << "km,"
00218                       << m.MaxHeight()/1000 << "km]\n";
00219           if (str >> stra)
00220             throw GeographicErr("Extra junk in input: " + s);
00221           real bx, by, bz, bxt, byt, bzt;
00222           m(time, lat, lon, h, bx, by, bz, bxt, byt, bzt);
00223           real H, F, D, I, Ht, Ft, Dt, It;
00224           MagneticModel::FieldComponents(bx, by, bz, bxt, byt, bzt,
00225                                          H, F, D, I, Ht, Ft, Dt, It);
00226 
00227           *output << DMS::Encode(D, prec + 1, DMS::NUMBER) << " "
00228                   << DMS::Encode(I, prec + 1, DMS::NUMBER) << " "
00229                   << Utility::str<real>(H, prec) << " "
00230                   << Utility::str<real>(by, prec) << " "
00231                   << Utility::str<real>(bx, prec) << " "
00232                   << Utility::str<real>(-bz, prec) << " "
00233                   << Utility::str<real>(F, prec) << "\n";
00234           if (rate)
00235             *output << DMS::Encode(Dt, prec + 1, DMS::NUMBER) << " "
00236                     << DMS::Encode(It, prec + 1, DMS::NUMBER) << " "
00237                     << Utility::str<real>(Ht, prec) << " "
00238                     << Utility::str<real>(byt, prec) << " "
00239                     << Utility::str<real>(bxt, prec) << " "
00240                     << Utility::str<real>(-bzt, prec) << " "
00241                     << Utility::str<real>(Ft, prec) << "\n";
00242         }
00243         catch (const std::exception& e) {
00244           *output << "ERROR: " << e.what() << "\n";
00245           retval = 1;
00246         }
00247       }
00248     }
00249     catch (const std::exception& e) {
00250       std::cerr << "Error reading " << model << ": " << e.what() << "\n";
00251       retval = 1;
00252     }
00253     return retval;
00254   }
00255   catch (const std::exception& e) {
00256     std::cerr << "Caught exception: " << e.what() << "\n";
00257     return 1;
00258   }
00259   catch (...) {
00260     std::cerr << "Caught unknown exception\n";
00261     return 1;
00262   }
00263 }
